title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant Wanted
job_overview:
Real Estate Virtual Assistant Wanted (Full-Time | Work From Home)

We are an Australian real estate company looking for an experienced Virtual Assistant to join our team.

Your tasks will include:

* Generating and following up leads
* Answering and making calls
* Managing rental properties and tenant inquiries
* Getting contact data from company websites
* Sending emails and setting appointments with directors
* Following up and supporting our daily operations

Requirements:

* Experience working in the real estate industry
* Excellent English communication (spoken and written)
* Confident on calls and lead follow-up
* Familiar with CRMs, Google Workspace, and property tools
* Reliable internet and quiet workspace

Working Hours:

Full-time | Monday to Friday | Philippine time aligned with AEST

How to Apply:

Send the following:

1. Resume
2. If Possible Voice recording (1â€“2 mins intro & your real estate experience)
3. Expected monthly salary (in PHP)
4. OnlineJobs.ph profile link

We are hiring immediately for a long-term role. Apply now and grow with us!
